reviews:
Great set released by hasbro. Especially like they paid homage to the past by keeping the wrong names printed on the cards.

Decent packing job by amazon. Figures arrived minty.
Excellent figure. Great details and paint. Super happy to add this to my collection. Great series if you haven‚Äôt watched it yet.
Carhartt quality. Great fit and nice and soft. Warm. Recommended

review_title: Description needs work! But sweater is nice.
reviews:
Great quality. Heavy thread and well sewn. Only issue I have is with the descriptions of this item. Above it says, 50/50 cotton blend and it also says 70/30 cotton blend. I can tell you, it‚Äôs a 70/30 cotton/poly blend. Another thing it says is ‚Äúadjustable closure‚Äù...not sure what this means as it has no adjustable closure that I can find.

All that said, I am very happy with my purchase.

review_title: This tool will help to get those tires turning sooner.
reviews:
Pretty good unit.

Would have given it 5 stars, but, as others have mentioned, they got powder coat all up in the threads of the spool part. This, however, allowed me to test the welds and metal of this winder, as I really needed to twist this sucker on there with all my might. Only got the shaft half way in there, but I‚Äôm not overly concerned about it coming loose. That Wh0r3 is on there good...and the thing never bent. Ok, alright eh! Keep on trucking, Driver.

Excellent screen protector. Fits the iPhone XR perfectly. Has a nice smooth finish that allows your fingers to easily slide across the screen. Adheres to the phone with ease and included frame makes install a breeze and with a little dexterity, perfect. Recommend.
Nice. Great detailing and quality paint. Waited months for this to get in stock, So glad to cop this for retail.

review_title: Great kit, fun to build it was!
reviews:
Great kit with tremendous detail.

This kit is not for the beginner, learn on a few cheaper, simpler kits before tackling this joint.

A socket set, screwdrivers, dowling - you will find these to be really helpful for this build..you will need something to help all the rounded curves this kit requires.

This kit does require patience to get all the rounded pieces right, but it will be worth it.

The two flaps on the wings, for me atleast, were a real pain. I probably folded the tab when I should have twisted it or visa versa, whatever, they are a sore spot for me on this kit, but other than that, had a lot of fun.

A must have for any SW Metal earth collection.

review_title: Another great kit from metal earth.
reviews:
Amazingly detailed for its small size.

Another excellent product from the folks at metal earth/fascinations.

Great fun to be had building this mini millennium falcon. Take your time, review and fully understand the instructions before starting and you are sure to end up with a great little model you and your friends will love.

As far as difficulty goes, this was not to hard but like all metal earth kits, there are small parts to deal with. This kit has some spares, so that helps, I needed to use a spare on the rear, above the engine exhaust, those tiny little pieces you have to fold in half, one broke on me, but they actually give you like 4 spares, so it was all good.

Liked this so much, I ordered the larger kit they have. Can‚Äôt wait to build it too.

So f%*#‚Äôn cool.

A great addition to any SW fans collection.

While there are certainly more accurate Vader masks out there, None of them, IMHO, come close to this product by Kenner as far as value goes.

The details on the inside of this mask are phenomenal. How the mask comes apart like it‚Äôs father it‚Äôs modeled after is impressive, most impressive.

Two things that would make this thing really rock; I wish you could turn on the breathing sounds and leave it on, rather than pushing the button for 3 - 4 breaths at a time. Also, I had hoped for the voice changing mechanics. Those two things would have put this mask over the top.

That being said, The price is very good and at the risk of repeating myself, compared to other masks on the market, the value here can‚Äôt be beat.

The only other gripe I have is, like others have said, the small tab/mold marks that can be found on the top of the helmet. Kinda bush league for a mask that has so much attention to detail.

But all in all, amazing.

review_title: Excellent unit. Will meet all of your sub space communications needs.
reviews:
This thing is the bees knees.

Looks, sounds and I‚Äôm sure feels just like the original prop.

Works flawlessly with my iPhone.

Beautifully built and comes with some really nice accessories such as the travel case, belt pouch and charging stand.

The manual and it‚Äôs design are not lost on this trek fan. The manual alone is a great addition to my collection.

Truly happy with this purchase. Great job by the manufacturer.

review_title: That scent you‚Äôve been searching for.
reviews:
Mmmmmm smells good.

Get lots of compliments with Versace Eros.
One of my favorites in my current rotation of creed aventus, Jean Paul Gaultier le male and Lacoste white.
Long lasting, fresh and the ladies love it.

Awesome 300ml bottle will last awhile.

Awesome figure to add to my collection.

Currently have 4 of these SW Bandai movie realizations figures and love them all. Next up, Boba Fett- but ouch- big money for that one.

Great figures. So sweet to get the Kahn figure in here too. While kirks sculpt is not the most accurate, they got Kahn near perfect.

Fans of the original series and movies are sure to love this kit. I do.

Awesome figure.

These Bandai figures never disappoint. The articulation and detailing are top notch. The extra parts are an amazing.

While these certainly aren‚Äôt for everyone, I love them. The marriage of ancient samurai and Star Wars was pure genius.

review_title: Soft metal that bends. But great for light duty jobs.
reviews:
Great pliers for building ‚Äúmetal earth‚Äù 3D laser cut model kits.

Not so great if you plan on using these for anything that requires a lot of force. These bend if you squeeze them too hard.

review_title: Easy kit to build, this is!
reviews:
Nice easy build. Great looking finished product. Fairly straightforward build, not too many tricky pieces. Rounding the engine exhaust ports was probably the most challenging part: easy peasy.

Great kit to learn the metal earth process.

Awesome kit. This r2 unit is a little bigger than the stand alone r2 kit, and the paint adds a really nice touch. As far as the 3PO, I had a lot of fun building him. I like how they give you the option of building the red or gold arm, while I am a bit of a traditionalist and initially had intentions of building the gold arm, the red metal just looks so cool that I had to build it. 3PO looks pretty good for having been born of metal sheets, impressive, quite impressive.

I‚Äôve built over twenty of the metal earth kits and this one was challenging. I wouldn‚Äôt take the chance of building this kit without first having built a few of the easier kits. This kit is quite expensive compared to some of the more simple builds, so learn on them, take your time and you will be rewarded with a beautiful, truly museum worthy piece of art to proudly display in your space.

Arrived way before expected date. Super fast shipping from Japan. Packaged perfectly. Arrived in pristine condition.

Figure is amazing. Attention to detail is outstanding. Very artistic take on a classic. Maybe not for everyone, but this lover of all things Japanese is in heaven when I look at this masterpiece.

Couldn‚Äôt be happier unless it were free.

review_title: Affordable and simple enough to learn with.
reviews:
Decent kit to learn on. Cost of the kit makes it an easy pill to swallow if you have to throw it away because of the learning curve involved with these delicate and unforgiving models. Example: if you bend a piece at the fold line the wrong way, when you bend it back the correct way, the bend becomes very brittle. One must use extreme caution when assembling these to ensure you are bending the pieces the right way.

Ad is deceiving in stating this is a metal earth product, it is not.

Don‚Äôt know if I messed up but my pedals don‚Äôt reach the floor and the bench seems way to short, or more accurately, the legs on the piano seem too long, I don‚Äôt know, maybe I messed up somewhere. Anyone else have this issue?

review_title: Great figure, poor handling by shipper.
reviews:
Great figure, McFarlane never disappoints.

What WAS disappointing, was how this seller decided to fold the packaging in order to fit it into the box they chose to use for shipping, which was obviously too small.

I am taking this lovely little lady out of the packaging, so it doesn‚Äôt really bother me. However, this unit is a collectors item and carries with it a premium on the price. If I was hoping to display this piece in its clamshell packaging, I would be seriously disappointed as the packaging was permanently affected by this rather poor decision.

It makes one nervous about ordering from this company in the future if this is how the treat my goods.

A company which, seemingly, specializes in collectables, and they don‚Äôt understand the importance of pristine packaging!?! ...or at the very least, an employee who doesn‚Äôt care.

As far as shipping speed goes, thumbs up there. Package was stuck in customs for far too long, but that is not sellers fault.

Overall pretty happy with my purchase.
Thanks.

review_title: Yup! This is a good one.
reviews:
This thing rocks. It is bright, seems to be quality materials and the app is easy to understand and use.

Easy to set up with home automation. works like a charm with Apple home. I

These Import Dragon figurines are a far cry from the quality seen during the Macfarlane years.

The most disappointing thing about these are the fact that most of these figurines are excactly the same as the next one, save for a different paint job. Yes, there are probably 4 or 5 different poses for all the players they make, I don‚Äôt know, but check this out; I have a Sean Monahan figure and a Connor Mcdavid figure, and they both have the exact same face and pose. Needless to say, neither one looks like either player! The only thing that makes them unique from each other is the paint job. This just won‚Äôt do.

Pretty disappointing regression from the quality of Macfarlane.

I get that having to sculpt each player individually is expensive, but, I may as well buy a lego figurine if I want to have a some memorabilia of my favourite players!

Step up your game Import Dragons!

Nice figurines. Came undamaged, on time and as expected.

If you are looking for the same stormtrooper‚Äôs that are displayed on the back of the ‚ÄúDarth Vader Centerpiece‚Äù packaging, then you‚Äôve found it. Bought 2 of these and they really complete the Vader display piece.

Love this maple leaf neon lights so much I bought 6 of ‚Äòem and have been giving them away as gifts. Everyone who has received one, loves it as much as I do. Company ships super fast from Canada and they come very well packaged to ensure their safe delivery. I do not regret my purchase in the least.
Real nice piece. Fits my big wrist perfectly. Elastic seems to be quality...time will tell.

review_title: Good light output, definitely get the UV effect.
reviews: Was looking for a decent UV light for the man cave. This unit exceeds all expectations. Recommended.
Yup, this is the one. This thing put the finishing touches on my Jagr Flames jersey. Kinda ironic that it‚Äôs the 100 yr patch, as that‚Äôs the same age as Jagr. Love it...and him.
Yo! These things are the cats ass.
